mapper.sql: a.id, a.order_no, a.purchase_by, a.order_date, a.dept_id, a.dept_name, a.order_status, a.audit_by, a.audit_date, a.refuse_reason, a.amount_count, a.amount_money, a.submit_start, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.sys_org_code, a.remarks, a.del_flag
LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON b.id = a.purchase_by
mapper.select: SELECT a.id as purchaseDetailId, a.apply_count AS applyCount, a.in_price as inPrice, b.number, b.NAME as productName, b.spec, b.version, c.NAME AS unitName, d.NAME AS supplierName, e.NAME AS venderName FROM pd_purchase_detail a LEFT JOIN pd_product b ON a.product_id = b.id LEFT JOIN pd_unit c ON b.unit_id = c.id LEFT JOIN pd_supplier d ON b.supplier_id = d.id LEFT JOIN pd_vender e ON b.vender_id = e.id WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.order_no = #{orderNo}
